attributes.action: hurry through legislation to raise the legal drinking age to 21
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The country is going down the pan with regards to alcohol fuelled violence and crime. The less people who are able to get seriously drunk in licenced premises will help prevent this violence amnd crime.Many under 21's seem too mentally immature to be responsible enough. It works in America, no reason it shouldn't work here.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
